title: Reference: Assessor-Recorder Exemption Codes
description: Exemption code reference dataset for the Assessor-Recorder historical secured property tax dataset. https://data.sfgov.org/d/wv5m-vpq2

columns.name: Exemption Code
columns.description: The code of an exemption. Exemptions provided under certain conditions to property owners.

columns.name: Exemption Definition
columns.description: The name of the exemption corresponding to the field "Exemption Code"
